guide_you_in_your_adventures: Guide you in your adventures. Temmah Assistance Voyage is your trusted partner for all your travel needs. Whether you are planning a family vacation, a business trip, or a solo adventure, our agency offers personalized services and complete assistance to ensure a stress-free and memorable trip. Trust our expertise to discover the world with peace of mind.
integrated_search_engine: Integrated search engine with advanced filters
search_engine_description: Allows users to search for plane tickets, taxis, and hotel rooms based on specific criteria such as destination, date, room type, price, airline, or vehicle type.
calendar_description: Displays an interactive calendar showing the availability of hotels, flights, and taxis in real-time. This allows users to choose departure and arrival dates and immediately check available options.
payment_description: Offers a secure payment gateway, supporting multiple payment methods such as credit cards, PayPal, and mobile payment services like Apple Pay or Google Pay.
reservation_management: Reservation confirmation and management via email or app
reservation_description: Sends a confirmation email after each reservation. Allows users to view, modify, or cancel their reservations directly from their account or via a link in the email.
all_rights_reserved: 2025 Temmah Assistance Voyages | All rights reserved
abidjan_info: Abidjan is the economic capital of Côte d'Ivoire and one of the most populous French-speaking cities in Africa. Activities: Visit the Saint-Paul Cathedral, explore the Banco National Park, and enjoy the beaches of Grand-Bassam. Also discover the lively nightlife in the Treichville and Marcory districts.
paris_info: Paris is the capital of France, known for its art, fashion, and culture. Activities: Climb the Eiffel Tower, visit the Louvre, and stroll along the Seine. Don't miss tasting French pastries in Parisian cafes and shopping on the Champs-Élysées.
nezahualcoyotl_info: Nezahualcoyotl is a city in Mexico. Activities: Explore the local markets, visit the historical sites, and enjoy the local cuisine.
miami_info: Miami is a major city in the southeastern United States. Activities: Visit the beaches, explore the nightlife, and enjoy the diverse culture.
dubai_info: Dubai is a city in the United Arab Emirates known for its modern architecture and luxury shopping. Activities: Visit the Burj Khalifa, explore the desert, and enjoy the shopping malls.
quebec_info: Quebec is a province in Canada known for its French-speaking population and historical sites. Activities: Visit Old Quebec, explore the national parks, and enjoy the local cuisine.
london_info: London is the capital of the United Kingdom known for its history and culture. Activities: Visit the British Museum, explore the parks, and enjoy the local pubs.
pekin_info: Pekin is the capital of China known for its historical sites and modern architecture. Activities: Visit the Great Wall, explore the Forbidden City, and enjoy the local cuisine.
newyork_info: New York is a major city in the United States known for its skyscrapers and cultural diversity. Activities: Visit Times Square, explore Central Park, and enjoy the local cuisine.
discover_incredible_destinations: Discover incredible destinations and make the choice of an unforgettable tourist trip with Temmah Assistance Voyage. Whether it's to explore paradisiacal beaches, majestic mountains, or historic cities, we have options for all tastes. Let us help you plan your next adventure and create memorable memories.
hero_subtitle: Discover the best destinations around the world with us.
